verses.roman:
caitanya-gosāñira guru--keśava bhāratī
ei pitāra vākya śuni' duḥkha pāila ati

synonyms: caitanya—Lord Caitanya; gosāñira—the spiritual master; guru—His spiritual master; keśava bhāratī—of the name Keśava Bhāratī; ei—these; pitāra—his father's; vākya—words; śuni'-hearing; duḥkha—unhappiness; pāila—got; ati—very much.
translation: When Acyutānanda heard from his father that Keśava Bhāratī was the spiritual master of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu, he was very unhappy.
